JobTitle: Sr. Product Marketing Manager, Payment Innovation
JobFullDesc: Join a movement in which everyone can win. We started a movement in which everyone can win – shoppers, retailers, society and every person on our team. To play fair, trust people and reward them for doing the right thing. We see and feel the impact of our work as more and more people gain financial freedom and retailers grow across the globe.Founded five years ago in Sydney, Australia, Afterpay has millions of active customers globally and is offered at the world’s best retailers around the world including  Anthropologie, Revolve, DSW, GOAT, Finish Line, Levi’s, Mac Cosmetics, Ray-Ban and many others. Afterpay is on a mission to power an economy in which everyone wins.Afterpay is completely free for customers who pay on time – helping people spend responsibly without incurring interest, fees or extended debt. Afterpay empowers customers to access the things they want and need, while still allowing them to maintain financial wellness and control, by splitting payments in four, for both online and in-store purchases. Afterpay is deeply committed to delivering positive outcomes for customers. We are focused on supporting our community of shoppers.We trust in the next generation and share a vision of a more accessible and sustainable world in which people are rewarded for doing the right thing.The Opportunity Our Product Marketing team leads go-to-market strategy for new launches, works closely with product to inform product roadmaps & strategy, and executes campaigns to drive production adoption & growth. Product Marketing is a highly cross-functional role at Afterpay, partnering closely with Product and Engineering, Brand, Sales, Design, Content, Growth & Acquisition, and Communications teams. Our team works across the entire product lifecycle, from helping shape the product, to driving launch, to growing product adoption post-launch.We are hiring an accomplished product marketer to drive the growth and evolution of some of our newest consumer payment options. This person will be responsible for helping scale & drive product adoption across key markets by building and executing against compelling, customer-facing campaigns and creating global strategies & playbooks to optimize the consumer funnel and drive engagement.  The ideal candidate has a strong track record of launching marketing campaigns to drive adoption of innovative consumer products. This role requires someone who thrives in fast paced environments and relishes in ambiguity. They must also excel as a leader of cross-functional teams and have experience managing and influencing a diverse set of stakeholders. The ideal candidate should have a strong track record of growing new product adoption.We are much more than our job descriptions, but here’s where you will begin….GTM Strategy & Execution - Develop a GTM strategy based on data & consumer insights, inclusive of target audience, end to end channel strategy, messaging, and positioning. Messaging & Positioning - Lead the development of product positioning and messaging that differentiates Afterpay in the marketCampaign strategies - Develop compelling campaigns & narratives that resonate with the target audience and drive trial & engagement Funnel optimization - Analyze the customer conversion funnel to understand where and why customers are dropping out and develop strategies to improve conversion. Product education & improvements - Partner with Product & Design to improve key user flows, in-product messaging, and product education (e.g. how it works landing page, sign-up flow)Sales enablement - Enable our sales team to sell to prospective merchants through compelling narratives, training, and marketing materials/collateral (including regularly updated external-facing and internal-facing 1-pagers on key features)Campaign analysis - Evaluate product and campaign performance using relevant KPIs and feedback from existing and prospective customers.Voice of the Customer- Partner with Product Management to influence roadmap based on customer, sales, and market feedbackProduct intelligence - Understand the product functionality and benefits deeply and translate into compelling narratives that resonate with consumers and merchantsMarket Intelligence- Maintain and improve our knowledge of consumer payment behaviors through qualitative and quantitative analysisCompetitive Intelligence- Be a domain expert on the competitive landscape Who are you? (Qualifications) Like us, you’ll be deeply committed to delivering positive outcomes for customers and passionate about shaping the future of Afterpay.6-8 years of relevant work experience in product marketingSelf-starter with an entrepreneurial spirit who has experience scaling 0-1 products and global programsExperience working on product marketing throughout a product’s lifecycle Prior experience in payments and/or fintech industry is a plusProven track record of strong cross-functional collaborationStrong verbal and written communicator, with the ability to synthesize a complex situation into a concise planData driven and strong analytical skillsA team player who is accountable, proactive, and solution-oriented How we reward you. We have a pay for performance culture so you can expect to be rewarded for high performance. We pride ourselves on fairness and offer a competitive total reward package made up of salary, incentives and benefits including the opportunity to enroll in our share matching plan. We have a strong focus on health and wellbeing at Afterpay as we aim to support you to succeed in both your career and personal lives, such as providing employees with a corporate membership to Headspace. We offer a wide range of insurance programs so you have the flexibility to choose what is best for you. Afterpay covers 100% of the employee cost and 75% of the cost of your dependents. We value diversity and a collaborative and inclusive environment where everyone feels they belong is important to us.How to Apply: We don’t know what the future holds. That’s the exciting part; we show up and make it happen. If you’re brave, if you’re committed to doing the right thing and excited by this opportunity, click apply now!Afterpay is continuing to hire for all open roles with all interviewing and on-boarding done virtually due to COVID-19. All new team members, in addition to current staff, will temporarily work from home until it is safe to return to our offices.
